info.name: message_api
info.description:
_**Messaging API with user registration and authentication**_

_**How to use:**_

_go to: GET - URL/api/testget to see all the messages - no authorization for this route._

_GET- URL/api - list of all registered user_

1. **Register -** Go to the route: POST - URL/api/register - perform registration to the server by providing - username, password, email - dont forget your creds !
2. **Login -** after you performed registration go to: POST - URL/api/signintoken/ - perform login with your creds . you will get as a response access token and refresh token. _copy the access token without the quotation marks - you will need to provide your token to authorization and accessing restricted routes !!_
3. **Get All Messages For Logged In User -** after you performed registration go to : URL/api/getmsgstouser/ provide access token and you will see all messages sent to logged user
4. **Get Unread messages For Logged in Use**r**\-** after you performed registration go to : URL/api/getunrduser /provide access token and you will see unread messages for logged in user
5. **Write Message -** after you performed registration go to : url/api/write/ provide access token than on reques body go to raw data and read your message using following keys: recevier , msg_body, msg_subject , your message will be sent
6. **Delete message-** after you performed registration go to URL/api/delmsguser/id provide access token and id and the message will be deleted
7. **Read message-** after you performed registration go to URL/api/readmessage/id provide access token and id and the message will be marked as read
8. **Logout-** after you performed registration go to URL/api/logout provide your access token and the server will log you out. you will need to perform login again to get aceess (new token)

request.description: Testing get all messages - view all messages -authorization needed!!!

Registration to the user while providing:

username, password, Email

After we have registered user we can login with its creds ,

we will get the users access token as part of the response . we will use it for

authenticate the user and access to restricted routes which requiring authentication token

formdata.value: Michael is very motivated and commited person that searching for his first oppurtunity.

request.description: Write message with Authorization - logged in user is the sender !! - token required
Get all messages for a specific user - for logged in user!!

response.name: GET api/getmsgstouser
response.body:
[
    {
        "_id": 2,
        "receiver": "Zazzi",
        "msg_body": "whats up zazzi, you are so zazzi bro",
        "msg_subject": "hi bro",
        "creation_date": "2022-12-02T21:44:07.414875Z",
        "is_read": false,
        "user": 1
    },
    {
        "_id": 12,
        "receiver": "Zazzi",
        "msg_body": "Hi all i am new here whats up ",
        "msg_subject": "hello everybody",
        "creation_date": "2022-12-04T13:48:49.553947Z",
        "is_read": true,
        "user": 9
    }
]

request.description: Mark message as read through PUT request with message id - login required

response.name: PUT api/readmessage/
response.body:
{
    "_id": 12,
    "receiver": "Zazzi",
    "msg_body": "Hi all i am new here whats up ",
    "msg_subject": "hello everybody",
    "creation_date": "2022-12-04T13:48:49.553947Z",
    "is_read": true,
    "user": 9
}

request.description:
GET api/getunrduser

Get all unread messages of the logged in user - authorization required

response.body:

request.description: DELETE message by message id - authorization needed
List of all registered user so you will know tho who send your message

\*PROD\*

List of all registered user so you will know to who send your message

EndFragment
